RestrictAllDofsBearing¶

class +AMrotorSIM.+Components.+Bearings.@RestrictAllDofsBearing.RestrictAllDofsBearing(arg)¶

Bases: AMrotorSIM.Components.Bearings.Bearing

RestrictAllDofsBearing acts on all dofs of the corresponding node Add stiffness and damping on every degree of freedom of the closest node of the rotor
